channel.title: Regarding Cache
channel.description:
I've recently been playing around with Project 06's Emu / PI remake. The cache is manually put into the C:/ Directory.
My question is how can I put the cache into the same file as the client so my friends can download and play without the hassel of downloading a seperate file to manually drag into their C:/ directory?
I don't have a webserver just hosting via my internet for friends so I can't allow the cache to be downloaded from a file server.
Thanks

item.title: Regarding Cache
item.dc:creator: @Controlkill Controlkill
item.description:
@Controlkill wrote:

Turns out the issue was within the actual client, I can use filedrop to host the cache DL but on this client I just get errors.

How can I change the location it looks for cache from C:/ to the actual file

I want to put the Cache in the same file as the Client, but can’t change it to C:/Controlkill/Desktop/Controlkills317 because the people that download it won’t have the same file directory.

Read full topic

item.title: Regarding Cache
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

Just put cache into dropbox in zip file and make auto cachedownloader… Makes stuff so much easier… enjoy

Read full topic
